title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Competencies: Academic Performance Improvement Strategies through LMS Interaction Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic LMS (Learning Management System) Usage and Fundamental Statistics Knowledge
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can analyze LMS clickstream data according to the CILC classification framework.
Learners can explain the statistical relationship between learning activity types and final grades.
The performance differences of predictive models across online/blended/in-person instructional modes can be compared.
A design strategy for personalized education utilizing learning analytics can be proposed.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
